// implementation of zeta entirely in script
//

//
// count of terms to be included in calculation
//
N = 1000
//
// log of first N integers saves repeated calculations
//
// logN = [0 < n <= N] ( ln n ) 
//

//
// logarithm array is constant so coding constant array improves efficiency
//

//
// implementation of exp comes from configuration file
//
!! RiemannZeta (z) = SIGMA [0 <= n < N] ( exp (- z * logN#n) )
